00016 template <typename T>
00017 class vector;

00019 namespace deviceT {
00020 
00029 template< typename T >
00030 class vector  {
00031         public:
00036                 typedef std::size_t size_type;
00037 
00042                 typedef T value_type;
00043 
00047                 vector () {}
00048                 
00054                 vector ( size_type size, T* device_pointer) : size_(size), device_pointer_(device_pointer) {}
00055                 
00061                 CUPP_RUN_ON_HOST CUPP_RUN_ON_DEVICE
00062                 size_type size() const;
00063 
00064 
00071                 CUPP_RUN_ON_DEVICE
00072                 T& operator[]( size_type size_type );
00073 
00080                 CUPP_RUN_ON_DEVICE
00081                 T const& operator[]( size_type index ) const;
00082                 
00083         private:
00084 
00088                 size_type size_;
00089 
00093                 T* device_pointer_;
00094                 
00095                 template <typename TT>
00096                 friend class cupp::vector;
00097 };
00098 
00099 template <typename T>
00100 T& vector<T>::operator[](size_type index) {
00101         return device_pointer_[index];
00102 }
00103 
00104 template <typename T>
00105 T const& vector<T>::operator[](size_type index) const {
00106         return device_pointer_[index];
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00110 template <typename T>
00111 typename vector<T>::size_type vector<T>::size() const {
00112         return size_;
00113 }
